oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph 01 of former Mayors Ben West and Beverly Briley in Bar Assembly Room, May 1958
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of former Nashville Mayor Ben West and former Metro Mayor Beverly Briley in the Bar Assembly Room in May 1958. At the time the photo was taken, West was Mayor of the City of Nashville and Briley was Davidson County Judge. The former Mayors are pictured posing in front of a relief map of Nashville and Davidson County Metropolitan Area. b & w; 3 x 4 in.
